version_description: We regularly bring you updates and new features to improve your experience. Have fun!
We regularly bring you updates and new features to improve your experience. Have fun!

CANADIAN PRIME MINISTER OF MOBILE GAMES
Phone Destruction wasn’t 100% efficient recently, due to a couple nasty bugs. Fortunately, our army of gnomes saw through the charade to resolve the issue. Play the updated version?

TEAMS: Chat with your teammates, donate and request cards!
EVENTS: Complete objectives to win rewards!
Bug fixes and balance updates!
PHONE DESTROYER is out now worldwide!

The world has been destroyed by PHONE DESTROYER™ and had to be fixed by our army of hard-working gnomes. They’ve applied some of the newly collected underpants to it, so get this update and destroy some phones NOW!
The game had undergone some heavy underpantsing, which is Latin for “fixing bugs and improving performance.” The game is now even more advanced than all of Canada, so why don’t you update , buddy?

CHRISTMAS IS COMING! Prepare some extra underpants for awesome festive activities!
HOWDY-HO! A Christmas Special card is on its way to Phone Destroyer!
DRESS UP! More outfits to keep your New Kid warm and stylish!
NEW ICON! This update can’t get any better!

This update was approved by the Ministry of Mobile Gaming. Download now!
Love is in the air with Cupid Cartman flying into town!

TIME TO GET FRIENDLY! Battle your teammates in FRIENDLY FIGHTS!! Try new combos, show who's the better player, and just have fun!

Also, a certain pair of friendly Canadians just farted their way into Phone Destroyer and are spreading chaos, confusion, and funny sounds throughout the streets of South Park.

DISCLAIMER: No underpants were harmed during the making of this update.
Love is in the air with Cupid Cartman flying into town!

Get ready for our BIGGEST and most EPIC update yet!

Our lovely Gnomes abandoned sleep completely to bring you:

- Complete special events WITH YOUR TEAMMATES and earn rewards TOGETHER!
- Earn PVP Packs the new way - by destroying enemy phones during battles!
- After many requests, you can now remove your clothes and BATTLE IN YOUR UNDERWEAR!
- For those super savers out there – DAILY DEALS!
- Legendary Leaderboards for our most HARDCORE fans!
- Improved Matchmaking, New Healthbars, and extreme bug fixing!

Canadian Ministry of Mobile Games commands you to update NOW!

Our army of underpants gnomes has been working day and night to bring you the best game experience:

- INCAN CRAIG! The Legendary Incan Craig is finally here, with an entirely new type of awe inspiring power!
- TONS of bug fixes and quality of life improvements!

- INCAN CRAIG! The Legendary Incan Craig is finally here, with an entirely new type of awe inspiring power!
- TONS of bug fixes and quality of life improvements!

Our underpants gnomes regularly bring you updates and new features to improve your experience! Have fun!

- NEW CARDS INCOMING! Including fan favorite characters with awesome new special powers!
- TONS of bug fixes and quality of life improvements!

DISCLAIMER: No gnomes were harmed during the making of this update.
We are constantly at work making our battles as smooth and bug free as possible.  This update addresses some battlefield issues that have recently been impacting gameplay.  Enjoy

A certain pair of friendly Canadians just farted their way into Phone Destroyer and are spreading chaos, confusion, and funny sounds throughout the streets of South Park.

DISCLAIMER: No underpants were harmed during the making of this update.

Our underpants gnomes regularly bring you updates and new features to improve your experience!

- NEW CHALLENGE! Play with pre-made decks, even if you don't own all the cards in them.
- CHALLENGE IMPROVEMENTS! More game modes, better matchmaking!
- NEW EMOTES! Wendy has joined Cartman to laugh, scream, and fart in the general direction of your PvP opponents!
- TONS of bug fixes!

DISCLAIMER: No actual phones have been destroyed during the making of this update.

Our talented army of underpants gnomes is back at it again with their most incredible creation yet: the SUPERHERO theme! - Play with Coon, Mysterion, Call Girl, Human Kite and other superheroes! - Unleash their awe-inspiring special powers and new spells to dominate the battlefield! - Complete a brand new single-player experience to earn the new superhero cards!
NOTE: This update has been fully approved for recreational and educational purposes by the Canadian Ministry of Mobile Games.

Our talented army of underpants gnomes is back at it again with their most incredible creation yet: the SUPERHERO theme! - Play with Coon, Mysterion, Call Girl, Human Kite and other superheroes! - Unleash their awe-inspiring special powers and new spells to dominate the battlefield! - Complete a brand new single-player experience to earn the new superhero cards!
NOTE: This update has been fully approved for recreational and educational purposes by the Canadian Ministry of Mobile Games.

Bugs are bad, m’kay? This is why we summoned our Underpants Gnomes so they could underpant them out of the game. Canadian Minister of Mobile Games himself approved the result, so now is the perfect time to update!

Our underpants gnomes are working non-stop to bring you updates and new features!
- You can now request (and donate) epic cards each Sunday!
- Premium Passes can now be purchased with multiple tiers unlocked from the start!
- Code support for awesome new cards!
- Bug fixes, optimizations, and under the hood improvements!
DISCLAIMER: No underpants were harmed during the making of this update.

Our own army of Underpants Gnomes injected some MYSTERIOUS ITEMS into the in-game rewards! While Canadian Ministry of Mobile Games is investigating the matter, collect as many of those as you can! Update NOW to find out what those items are!
DISCLAIMER: No underpants were harmed, and many bugs have been fixed, during the making of this update.

TEAM WARS are here! Built by the army of Underpants Gnomes, it offers a new unique way for teams to compete:

- DRAFT your Team Deck!
- LEVEL UP the cards in your Team Deck together with your Teammates!
- BATTLE players across the world!
- Assert dominance and climb the leaderboards to be the #1 team in South Park!

No actual phones have been destroyed during the making of this update.
The game had undergone some heavy underpantsing, which is Latin for “fixing bugs and improving performance.” The game is now even more advanced than all of Canada, so why don’t you update , buddy?

Underpants gnomes regularly bring you updates to improve your experience. Have fun!

- Card Event rework! Featured cards can be boosted by other cards in your deck!
- Team Wars improvements!
- Send feedback to the team directly from the game!
- Loading time optimizations, bug fixes and more!

Canadian Ministry of Mobile Gaming commands you to update NOW!
- South Park is celebrating Christmas, and you should too! 
- New ICON! Because we all like new icons, right?
- Tons of FIXES to make battles as smooth and bug-free as possible!
- And a NEW CARD to make festivities even more festive!

Get ready for our biggest update yet! Our army of restless Underpants Gnomes worked day and night to bring you:

- New and improved PVP LADDER! Better matchmaking and smoother progression!
- BATTLE PASS! Earn extra rewards by participating in any of game modes!
- Revamped ECONOMY! The loot in this game just can’t get any better!
- LOADS of improvements, optimizations and bug fixes!

DISCLAIMER: Very few underpants were harmed during the making of this update.

Bugs are bad, m'kay? This is why our Underpants Gnomes fixed a bunch of them for this update, and also prepared a couple of nice additions to the game.
- Practice with your Team War deck in Friendly Fights!
- Special Soap Boxes - a brand new way to customize your New Kid! More of them coming in the future!
- Quality of life and stability improvements!
DISCLAIMER: No underpants were harmed during the making of this update.

Our underpants gnomes are working non-stop to bring you updates and new features! Features below were approved by the Canadian Ministry of Mobile Games for educational and recreational purposes:

- TEAM WARS are now more exciting than ever!
- OTHER quality of life improvements and bugfixes!

DISCLAIMER: No underpants were stolen during the making of this update

With industrious underpantsing, our gnomes have delivered an update like never before! All changes have been reviewed and approved by the Canadian Ministry of Mobile Gaming.

- A new event type: complete tasks to gain points and collect rewards of your choice!
- Valentine’s events with a new Battle Pass and characters!
- News tool video feature!
- An improved early game experience

DISCLAIMER: No underpants were harmed during the making of this update.

Our tireless underpants gnomes have been hard at work improving your gameplay experience. Enjoy!

- A brand new –and electric– card is coming!

- iOS 13 SDK Support
- Various bugfixes

PS: No actual phones were destroyed in the making of this update

Canadian ministry of mobile gaming has issued an order to deliver the following update:

- Revamped Battle Pass system, with monthly Battle Passes and a better progression system!
- Professor Chaos has taken over Challenges with multiple improvements!
- New character with dark wings looms over South Park

Update now!

P.S. No phones were underpantsed in the making of this update

The Gnomes have been underpantsing vigorously to deliver you the following updates:
- Watch ads to collect FREE rewards!
- New Chaos Mode rules to play with!
- Improved shop UI!
- Frontier Bradley arrives with his collection of elixirs and snake oils!

Update now!
P.S. No actual phones were harmed in the making of this update

The Gnomes have become disillusioned with the society, have realized that underpantsing is for conformist posers, and embraced their deep darkness within, bringing the following updates:

- Goth Kids are arriving to South Park: Phone Destroyer!
- Tutorial improvements!
- Revised in game store!
- New Chaos Mode types!

Update now!

Update now!

Bugs are bad 'mkay? Our gnomes have been underpantsing day and night to hunt them down, so update now!

- Improved in-game news
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

They're coming right for us! Join the hunt for Cheesy Poofs with Jimbo with this cheese dust covered update!

- All new Cheesy Poof event! Collect these delicious snacks and exchange them for cards and materials!
- Hunter Jimbo enters Phone Destroyer! Get the new card early from the first Cheesy Poof event!
- Player history feature, review your past actions and purchases!
- Changes to the MMR algorithm against de-ranking!
